summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 777 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), outside temperature (up 1.7°C), and light levels (up 2625 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 720.8m higher than yesterday, 177.0m lower than the past week, 777.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1986.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, a humid atmosphere. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
